title: Trouble with FontAgent Pro for Windows - Release Candidate 1
content:
I'm hoping some of you out there have been involved in the beta testing of FAP 4 for Windows.

I've just installed the RC1 and all went smoothly. EXCEPT now, while correctly listing all my fonts in their various Libraries and Sets, FontAgent Pro shows them ALL as being INactive.

I'm guessing I did not follow some correct order of steps during the install.

Any aid here?

Jim
author: ShepherdJim
